title: Just had a match against a grandmaster, master, diamond and 2 plats.
body:
I'm plat 3.


Fix your fucking game.

replies.body: You were playing flex queue. Everyone had a similar flex ranking. Fix your posts lmao.

> flex queue

2k19 and still taking flex queue seriously LOL

Flex queue is very imbalanced, I think it's the lack of players that play it tbh. If you can't queue with a grand master as plat why are you able to vs them? MMR makes no sense as it does not reflect your rank.

> [{quoted}](name=Foe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HkFTdz5j,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-06-21T23:25:05.078+0000)
>
> If you can't queue with a grand master as plat why are you able to vs them?

Because the matchmaker bases its decisions on the MMR of ten players to form an even match, while two players who want to queue together base that decision on e.g. friendship.

How can we form any opinion on this if we don't know what your team had?

Looks like you're not even posting on your main ... CD8 is Gold 3, so we can't even check op.gg

Without any other info - this just comes off as whining.

> [{quoted}](name=Kryptich,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HkFTdz5j,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-21T22:06:20.720+0000)
>
> How can we form any opinion on this if we don't know what your team had?
> 
> Looks like you're not even posting on your main ... CD8 is Gold 3, so we can't even check op.gg
> 
> Without any other info - this just comes off as whining.

That's his solo rank, he's p1 in flex queue, which he's been playing
are you playing flex? do you have more than 5 iq?

Okay, what about your friends? Also grand master, master, a diamond, and another plat?

Bet.
